title: Debugging in forward codes of defined model.
body_html:
Hi, I want to debug my model by stepping through lines in model's forward codes. However, when I tried to enter the model, it directly jump into the call method in module.py, how can I reach the forward codes written by myself?

ps: I use Spyder for debugging.
body_text:
Hi, I want to debug my model by stepping through lines in model's forward codes. However, when I tried to enter the model, it directly jump into the call method in module.py, how can I reach the forward codes written by myself?
ps: I use Spyder for debugging.
body:
Hi, I want to debug my model by stepping through lines in model's forward codes. However, when I tried to enter the model, it directly jump into the __call__ method in module.py, how can I reach the forward codes written by myself?

ps: I use Spyder for debugging.
